Headline: #60 Blue Island/26th Temporary Reroute at Pulaski/26th
ShortDescription: 60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted via 26th, Kedzie, Cermak, Kostner and 26th, due to street blockage near Pulaski/26th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 26th, Kedzie, Cermak, Kostner and 26th, due to street blockage near Pulaski/26th.

Allow extra travel time.
